publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-993 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Vulnerable Witnesses (Scotland) Bill - Business Motion-That the Parliament agrees that, during the Stage 3 proceedings of the Vulnerable Witnesses (Scotland) Bill, debate on each part ofÂ those proceedings shall be brought to a conclusion by the time-limits indicated (each time-limit being calculated from when Stage 3 begins and excluding any periods when other business is under consideration or when the meeting of the Parliament is suspended or otherwise not in progress) Groups 1 and 2 - no later than 45 minutes Groups 3 and 4 - no later than 1 hour 10 minutes Group 5 - no later than 1 hour 30 minutes Groups 6 and 7 - no later than 1 hour 45 minutes Group 8 - no later than 2 hours Groups 9 to 11 - no later than 2 hours 30 minutes Motion to pass the Bill - no later than 3 hours 20 minutes Supported by: Tavish Scott*
